definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: back—[[גֵּו]] abs. unused, cstr. Pr 10:13 + 2 t., sf. [[גֵּוִי]] Is 50:6, [[גֵּוְךָ]] Is 38:17, [[גֵּוֵךְ]] Is 51:23; —back, as beaten, lashed Pr 10:13, Pr 19:29, Pr 26:3 cf. Is 50:6; in phr. ´[[הִשְׁלִיךְ אַחֲרֵי ג]] (as [[גַּו]]) Is 38:17, of Yahweh's casting sins of penitent behind his back, putting them out of mind; as trodden upon Is 51:23, fig. of extreme humiliation.
